Package DATABASE

package DATABASE
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DBConnection
    Handles database connection.
    DBDelete
    Provides database operations for deleting questions from the quiz system.
    DBFetch
    Handles database operations for retrieving questions from the quiz system.
    DBInsertion
    Handles database operations for inserting new questions into the quiz system database.
    DBLogin
    Handles user authentication and role management for the quiz system.
    DBQuiz
    Handles quiz-specific database operations including game play, scoring, leaderboards, and player statistics.
    DBUpdate
    Handles database operations for updating existing questions in the Quiz database.
